SecurityGroupEgress.Description: Allow all outbound traffic by default

Properties.Description: IAM role for Kamiwaza EC2 instance (job 51)

UserData.Fn::Base64:
#!/bin/bash
# Kamiwaza Deployment Script (compressed)
# Original size: 21892 bytes
# Compressed size: 6497 bytes
# This wrapper decompresses and executes the full deployment script

set -euo pipefail

# Log start of decompression
echo "[$(date +'%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S')] Decompressing Kamiwaza deployment script..." | tee -a /var/log/kamiwaza-deployment.log

# Use heredoc to avoid shell argument length limits with long base64 strings
base64 -d << 'COMPRESSED_SCRIPT_EOF' | gunzip | bash

COMPRESSED_SCRIPT_EOF

VpcId.Description: VPC ID (for reuse in future deployments)

BootstrapVersion.Description: Version of the CDK Bootstrap resources in this environment, automatically retrieved from SSM Parameter Store. [cdk:skip]

Assertions.AssertDescription: CDK bootstrap stack version 6 required. Please run 'cdk bootstrap' with a recent version of the CDK CLI.
